# strokeStyle(style:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the given stroke style to drawn map overlays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func strokeStyle(style: StrokeStyle) -> some MapContent

```

## Parameters

- **style**: The stroke style to apply.

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapContent] with overlays drawn with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/StrokeStyle] you specified.

## Setting stroke properties

- **stroke(_:lineWidth:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **stroke(_:style:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the stroke style you specify.
- **stroke(lineWidth:)**: Applies the given stoke drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
